params._admin: Address to be granted the default admin role and initial access management permissions

role(bytes4,address).details: The role identifier is a unique identifier derived packing the selector and contract address

params._contract: Address of the contract containing the method
params._selector: Function selector (4-byte identifier) of the method

returns.roleId: Unique role identifier derived from the selector and contract address

initialize(address).notice: Initialize the access control system with a default admin

role(bytes4,address).notice: Get the role identifier for a specific function selector on a contract
